name.baseName: Steel bar production ; Exposed steel was coated with corrosion resistant materials for protection ; Total of all wind farm
钢筋生产 ; 外露钢表面涂覆耐腐蚀材料进行防护 ; 整个风电场

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: This dataset describes the use of steel bars that are coated with corrosion resistant materials used in the construction of offshore wind farms. Specifically, it is applicable to the Donghai Bridge Offshore Wind Farm (DBOWF), which involves processes such as manufacturing, transportation, installation, operation, maintenance, dismantling, and recycling of the wind farm's components. The protective coating on the steel bars improves their longevity and performance in the marine environment, a critical factor considering the corrosive sea air and water. This dataset is relevant for use in the environmental impact assessment of similar offshore wind energy projects.
该数据集描述了在海上风电场建设中使用的钢筋外露钢表面进行耐腐蚀材料涂覆的过程。具体地，它适用于东海大桥海上风电场（DBOWF），涉及制造、运输、安装、运行、维护、拆解和回收风电场组件的过程。钢筋的防腐涂层改善了其在海洋环境中的寿命和性能，这是考虑到腐蚀性海洋空气和水的重要因素。该数据集有助于评估类似海上风能项目的环境影响。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit is 1 kWh on-grid electricity provision.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The studied wind farm, the Donghai Bridge Offshore Wind Farm (DBOWF), is China's first offshore wind farm within the jurisdiction of Shanghai, as well as the first offshore wind farm outside Europe. The project has two-phases of construction, located on each side of the Donghai bridge (Fig. 1).
所研究的风电场- -东海大桥海上风电场( DBOWF )是中国在上海管辖范围内的第一个海上风电场，也是欧洲以外的第一个海上风电场。工程分两期施工，分别位于东海大桥两侧(图1 )。

technology.technologicalApplicability: This dataset describes the use of steel bars that are coated with corrosion resistant materials used in the construction of offshore wind farms. Specifically, it is applicable to the Donghai Bridge Offshore Wind Farm (DBOWF), which involves processes such as manufacturing, transportation, installation, operation, maintenance, dismantling, and recycling of the wind farm's components. The protective coating on the steel bars improves their longevity and performance in the marine environment, a critical factor considering the corrosive sea air and water. This dataset is relevant for use in the environmental impact assessment of similar offshore wind energy projects.
该数据集描述了在海上风电场建设中使用的钢筋外露钢表面进行耐腐蚀材料涂覆的过程。具体地，它适用于东海大桥海上风电场（DBOWF），涉及制造、运输、安装、运行、维护、拆解和回收风电场组件的过程。钢筋的防腐涂层改善了其在海洋环境中的寿命和性能，这是考虑到腐蚀性海洋空气和水的重要因素。该数据集有助于评估类似海上风能项目的环境影响。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: The present study employed the PLCA modeling approach to calculate the energy and environmental emissions of a typical offshore wind farm in China. The cradle-to-grave process includes four stages, materials and equipment manufacturing, transportation and installation, operation and maintenance, and dismantling and recycling (Fig. 2).
本研究采用PLCA建模方法计算了中国某典型海上风电场的能源和环境排放。从摇篮到坟墓的过程包括材料和设备制造、运输和安装、操作和维护、拆解和回收4个阶段(图2 )。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The technical parameters of wind turbines, foundations and cables are obtained from the design documents of the DBOWF (Table 2). For key materials and equipment, their sea transportation energy is calculated from the transportation load and shipping energy intensity. The facility installation energy and emissions were estimated based on the construction plan. The wind farm's operation and maintenance data, such as the frequency and working time of maintenance, were obtained from site investigations with engineers and technicians. The uncertainties associated with model parameters and input data are illustrated in the sensitivity analysis section of this paper.
风机、基础和电缆的技术参数从DBOWF的设计文件中获得(表2)。对于关键材料和设备，其海上运输能量由运输负荷和海运能量强度计算得到。根据施工方案，对设施安装能耗和排放进行了估算。风电场的运行和维护数据，如维护的频率和工作时间，是通过与工程技术人员的现场调查获得的。与模型参数和输入数据相关的不确定性在本文的敏感性分析部分进行了说明。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Yang, J. et al. The life-cycle energy and environmental emissions of a typical offshore wind farm in China. Journal of Cleaner Production 180, 316–324 (2018).
Yang, J. et al. The life-cycle energy and environmental emissions of a typical offshore wind farm in China. Journal of Cleaner Production 180, 316–324 (2018).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this dataset for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) of offshore wind farms, users should note the following: The technical parameters should be verified to match those of the wind farm being assessed. The dataset's relevance to specific marine environments should be validated. Users should integrate the data with models that account for the technical specifications of the turbines, foundations, cables, and related offshore infrastructure. Consideration of transportation and installation processes is crucial. Operational and maintenance practices indicated in the dataset should reflect real-world conditions. Sensitivity analyses should be conducted to understand the influence of uncertainties in model parameters and input data.
在使用此数据集进行海上风电场生命周期评估（LCA）时，用户应注意以下事项：应核实技术参数是否与评估的风电场匹配。应验证数据集对特定海洋环境的适用性。用户应将数据与考虑了风轮机、基础、电缆和相关海上基础设施技术规格的模型整合。运输和安装过程的考虑至关重要。数据集中指示的运行和维护实践应反映实际条件。应进行敏感性分析，以了解模型参数和输入数据的不确定性的影响。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
